head.description: function-max-empty-lines Limit the number of adjacent empty lines within functions. 限制函数中相邻的空行数量。 Options int: Maximum number of characters…
head.title: function-max-empty-lines

body:
#function-max-empty-lines

Limit the number of adjacent empty lines within functions.

限制函数中相邻的空行数量。

a {
  transform:
    translate(
                /* ← */
      1,        /* ↑ */ 
                /* ← */
      1         /* ↑ */
                /* ← */
    );          /* ↑ */
}               /* ↑ */
/**                ↑
 *            These lines */

#Options

int: Maximum number of characters allowed.

int：所允许的最大值。

For example, with 0:

比如，0：

The following patterns are considered warnings:

以下模式被认为是个警告：

a {
  transform:
    translate(

      1,
      1
    );
}
a {
  transform:
    translate(
      1,

      1
    );
}
a {
  transform:
    translate(
      1,
      1

    );
}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

以下模式正常：

a {
  transform: 
    translate(
      1, 
      1
    );
}
